pkgmetadata.longdescription: # JCS - JSON Canonicalization for Python 3[![Tests](https://github.com/titusz/jcs/actions/workflows/tests.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/titusz/jcs/actions/workflows/tests.yml)This is a Python 3 package fora [JCS (RFC 8785)](https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc8785) compliant JSONcanonicalization.The main author of this code is [Anders Rundgren](https://github.com/cyberphone). Theoriginal source code isat [cyberphone/json-canonicalization](https://github.com/cyberphone/json-canonicalization/tree/master/python3)including comprehensive test data.## Installation```bash$ pip install jcs```## Using JCS```pythonimport jcsdata = jcs.canonicalize({"tag": 4})```
